## Source: ossf-package-analysis (82af2c45ed14815666ad7eaac7fdfeb8808c4c00e9e5155b86c6862802025e25)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'chia-gaming-lobby-connection' @ 2.2.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
